Subjects: God, love of; mercy, works of

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines: Deus caritas estA deore god omnipotent…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…þenkiþ nouþe On Deus CaritasAnd bring vs alle
                    to good endyng
